	public static SimpleLinkedList<Integer> factorizacion(int num, SimpleLinkedList<Integer> factor) {
		int divisor = 2;
		while (num != 1) {
			if(num % divisor == 0) {
				factor.addLast(divisor);
				num = num/divisor;
			}else {
				divisor++;
			}
		}
		return factor;
	}
